text: Harvey's is a fast food restaurant chain operating in Canada. It has locations in every province except British Columbia. It serves hamburgers, poutine, hot dogs, french fries, onion rings, and other traditional Canadian fast-food fare. It was founded in 1959. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 establishments in North America Category:1950s establishments in Canada Category:Canadian fast food restaurants Category:Companies based in Ontario
title: Harvey's
